abstract: Experts say autonomy measure passed by Ukrainian Parliament for eastern districts of Luhansk and Donetsk merely acknowledges reality of situation, as districts essentially under Russian control; measure has been met with violent protests in Ukraine, but experts say recognition of Russian control may be key to ending fighting.
lead_paragraph: The move could be a necessary step to resolving bitter fighting, which has cost over 6,500 lives and has driven the Ukrainian economy close to collapse, some analysts say.

headline.main: Ukraine Weighs Autonomy for Parts of East, Already in Russia’s Thrall
headline.print_headline: Autonomy Measure in Ukraine Would Only Acknowledge Reality

snippet: The move could be a necessary step to resolving bitter fighting, which has cost over 6,500 lives and has driven the Ukrainian economy close to collapse, some analysts say.
